Recommendations.Title: Supplementary Planning Guidance Note: Renewable Energy
Key Strengths: Provides specific guidelines for renewable energy systems like solar electricity (PV) and solar thermal panels
Mentions that planning permission might not be required for certain installations
Recommendations.Reasoning: This document appears to directly address the customer's need for information related to renewable energy systems, especially solar panels.

Recommendations.Title: Supplementary Planning Guidance Note: West Rhyl Regeneration ...
Key Strengths: Includes guidelines for solar thermal panels and other methods of renewable energy
Highlights the need to confirm whether planning permission is required before installing any renewable energy technology
Recommendations.Reasoning: This document discusses aspects of renewable energy systems, making it a relevant resource for individuals seeking information on the topic.

Recommendations.Title: Supplementary Planning Guidance Note: Conservation Areas
Key Strengths: Discusses changes and alterations within conservation areas, including solar panels and other structures
Highlights that planning permission may be needed for certain alterations
Recommendations.Reasoning: This document touches upon the subject of alterations in conservation areas, which could include the installation of solar panels.

Recommendations.Title: Search and comment on Planning applications | Denbighshire ...
Key Strengths: Allows users to search for planning applications in the area
Provides an opportunity to comment on or oppose planning applications
Recommendations.Reasoning: While this resource doesn't directly provide information about renewable energy, it offers a means of researching and potentially influencing local planning decisions relating to solar panels installations.

Recommendations.Title: Search applications
Key Strengths: Allows users to search for planning applications within a specified date range
Displays information on application code number, type of application and the status of the application
Recommendations.Reasoning: This resource could be useful in researching specific renewable energy projects or solar panels installations by providing access to local planning applications.

raw_result.Analysis Notes: The search results include a variety of resources related to planning, building regulations, and supplementary planning guidance. Most of the documents referenced deal with general guidelines for various aspects within planning and construction in Denbighshire County Council's jurisdiction, but several offer relevant information about renewable energy systems, especially solar panels. Although not all documents are directly focused on council customer information needs for renewable energy-related questions, they provide helpful resources for gaining insights into local planning decisions related to renewable energy and solar panel installations.
raw_result.Recommendations Notes: Among the listed search results, several offer valuable recommendations for understanding the local context of renewable energy projects and potentially finding relevant information about solar panel installations. The first and third document provide detailed guidelines for renewable energy systems and emphasize that planning permission might not be required for certain installations. The fifth document discusses changes and alterations within conservation areas, which could include the installation of solar panels. Lastly, the sixth resource allows users to search for a wide range of local planning applications, potentially uncovering relevant renewable energy projects or individual solar panel installations.
